items.title: AI companions: A threat to love, or an evolution of it?
items.description: As AI companions from companies like Replika, Character AI, and Nomi AI abound, love is no longer strictly human. In this debate, we ask the question ...

items.title: The Very Real Case for Brain-Computer Implants
items.description: On this episode of Uncanny Valley, we dive into the heated race between two companies to build a commercial brain-computer interface.

items.title: Apple iOS 26 public beta arrives
items.description: Apple released iOS 26 in public beta. Here's everything you can expect, from the Liquid Glass design to features powered by Apple Intelligence.

items.title: This industrial AI startup is winning over customers by saying it won’t get acquired
items.description: In red-hot acquisition market, this CVector founders answer this key question in its first conversation with prospective customers.

items.title: Cursor’s New Bugbot Is Designed to Save Vibe Coders From Themselves
items.description: One of the most popular platforms for AI-assisted programming says the next era of vibe coding is all about supercharging error detection.

items.title: Google’s new Web View search experiment organizes results with AI
items.description: Google's new Search Labs experiment will organize the search results using AI smarts.

items.title: Chime backer Lauren Kolodny bets on AI to revolutionize estate processing
items.description: Acrew Capital's Kolodny led a $20 million Series A in Alix, a startup that uses AI to automate estate processing.
